title: Untitled, illustration to Gottfried Keller's poem "Whitsuntide in Berlin" (Berliner Pfingsten) (border, 3rd song, folio 41) from the periodical Der Bildermann, supplement to vol. 1, no. 5 (Jun 1916)
dimensions: Composition (irreg.): 11 x 8 1/4" (28 x 21 cm); page: 14 x 11" (35.6 x 27.9 cm)
credits: Gift of Mrs. Bertha M. Slattery
